SourceDBClusterSnapshotIdentifier.description: The identifier of the DB cluster snapshot to copy. This parameter is not case-sensitive. Constraints:   Must contain from 1 to 63 alphanumeric characters or hyphens.   First character must be a letter.   Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.   Example: my-cluster-snapshot1

TargetDBClusterSnapshotIdentifier.description: The identifier of the new DB cluster snapshot to create from the source DB cluster snapshot. This parameter is not case-sensitive. Constraints:   Must contain from 1 to 63 alphanumeric characters or hyphens.   First character must be a letter.   Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.   Example: my-cluster-snapshot2
